attributes.action: Post Study Work Visa Should be eligible for 2020 January Intake Students
attributes.background: Government should introduce Post Study Work Visa before July 2021 and allow students to apply for Graduate Route Visa who are from January 2020 intake and there Visa finished before September

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend the 2 years post-study work visas to 2020 Graduates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571665

Extend new Graduate Route to 2020 and pre-July 2021 graduates: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578675
